description:
Eager to hit the court in Mario Tennis Aces for Nintendo Switch? Mark your calendars and get warmed up for the Pre-launch Online Tournament, set to serve up good ol’ tennis fun from 00:00 AEST (02:00 NZST) on June 2nd, right through the weekend until 07:59 AEST (09:59 NZST) on June 4th! 

Aspiring aces can take to the court as Mario, Peach, Yoshi or Bowser to face off against other tennis hopefuls in online tournament matches, or sharpen your skills by practising against the computer. As a reward for taking part, you’ll receive a special outfit for Mario to use in the full game!
name: Mario Tennis™ Aces: Pre-launch Online Tournament
